TopicTitle: [WIP] [Firespitter] [Smart Parts] [BDArmory] V1 Flying Bomb Interception, a la Manley

Articles.Content:
I watched Scott Manley's Drone Interception video and thought: "That sounds fun - I should do that..."

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/bYNgl)

The V1 uses altitude sensors to (1) jettison the landing gear; (2) fire the secondary rocket boosters; and (3) activate SAS.

Problem is that the interceptor plane can shoot the drone down, but I can't *quite* get it to land without crashing ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif)

It turns out that more engines isn't always better. Moving to a single-engine design that *almost* looks like a Hawker Hurricane (if you squint really hard) did the trick:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/riWqb)

**Update:** I have uploaded the V-1 replica and the Hawker Hurricane replica [here](https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0BwjcH5bX0ssYfm4tV09MYzhWMC0zd3o3LTZjNWZaeURBWWpkMXFVOG56TDdKNW8zaXhKa0U&usp=sharing&tid=0BwjcH5bX0ssYfjlFd2pOTExiaW41MlNEcEZMTFdpNW85WmZtX3AxSnRwNlJsazJUei1MdE0). (Note: tested in NEAR only. Requires Smart Parts, patched Firespitter and BDArmory.)
